home.head: Welcome to My Portfolio
home.title: Front-End Developer | UI/UX Enthusiast | AI Passionate

about.title: About Me
about.description: Front-end Developer with over 5 years of experience building dynamic web applications using React.js (Next.js) and Svelte.  Proficient in React, related libraries, and supporting tools. Expert in designing user-friendly interfaces and optimizing user experience. Effective team player with excellent communication and project management skills. Always staying updated with trends to ensure effective solutions that meet client needs.

description: Team-worked in a lot of projects for 4 years ago such as presentation, requirement analyzing, reporting.
Participate in extracurricular activities sport, school arts.

justSkin.title: JUSTSKIN
justSkin.description: JUSTSKIN is a React Native mobile application tailored for dermatologists and medical professionals. It enables capturing or uploading patient skin images for accurate assessment and analysis. The app maintains detailed patient records, including treatment history and prescriptions.
responsibilities: Build module management (forms, reusable components)
Apply TensorFlow camera AI to detect body parts
Convert Figma designs to React Native components
Integrate with APIs to get/add/update/delete patients, sessions, lesions, etc.

bht.title: BHT
bht.description: Developed high-quality, photorealistic images and videos for architecture and luxury real estate using advanced 3D technologies. Implemented detailed models, lighting and material effects, and streamlined delivery workflows.
responsibilities: Build CMS gallery, customer unit management, configuration and Marzipano integration
Implement socket-based real-time sync between devices on the same account
Convert Figma to React components
Integrate with backend APIs to CRUD users, amenities, etc.
Collaborate on code reviews and improve code quality
Refactor styles from SCSS to Tailwind CSS

nvp.title: NVP
nvp.description: Platform for doctors, patients, admins and super-admins with role-based access. Features appointment booking with calendar and Zoom integration, and patient management for a hospital specializing in autism-related services.
responsibilities: Build calendar component
Translate Figma into Next.js components
Refactor for reusable components and optimize rendering
Improve UI/UX with hover effects, skeleton loaders and API feedback
Integrate with APIs for CRUD operations
Participate in code reviews

assa.title: ASSA
assa.description: ASSA supports workplace safety and compliance: employee induction, contractor onboarding, incident reporting, custom training courses, bulk employee uploads, and compliance reporting to improve workplace safety.
responsibilities: Implement authentication (login, forgot password, token handling)
Convert Figma to Next.js components
Refactor and build reusable components, optimize rendering
Improve UI/UX (hover states, skeletons, loading states)
Integrate with APIs for CRUD
Set up Husky, ESLint, Prettier and improve code quality

maker.title: MAKER
maker.description: Redbrick Makers is a coding education platform for ages 6-18. It offers project-based curriculum, courses in block coding, JavaScript, Python and AI, a software builder with many assets, and an LMS for educators.
responsibilities: Convert Figma designs to Next.js components
Implement features (buy/sell, invite users, OAuth flows, class features)
Mentor new members
Participate in code reviews

ivfmd-chat.title: IVFMD CHAT
ivfmd-chat.description: IVFMD Family app provides integrated chat for patients and clinic support teams. Allows scheduling, treatment discussions and direct questions to improve the fertility treatment process.
responsibilities: Implement chat input (mentions, loading animations)
Handle conversation features (delete, edit, hide messages) and chat UI standardization
